ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:21:37 [Issue ID 4000-722851] urn:comicvine:4000-722851 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:02:09. [Issue ID 2024522]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now in her own series, the fan favorite Zombie Tramp/Vampblade/DollFace mash-up (with the powers of all three iconic characters) returns!! Rocketed into space by the Danger Doll Squad, Amalgama: Space Zombie plots a course for explosive sci-fi grindhouse action!
Debut issue in a new Danger Doll universe series!
Features 4 regular and risqué variants, including cover 1 of 3 from the Elias Chatzoudis Amalgama variant set!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------------|------------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 2 | | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Marco Maccagni | 3 | | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 4 | | E | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | TMChu | 5 | | F | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | TMChu | 6 | | G | Amalgama Set Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Elias Chatzoudis | 7 | | H | Risqué Amalgama Set Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Elias Chatzoudis | 8 |
ComicInfo.Title: Part One
